channel.title: Office of Inspector General
channel.description: Updated Office of Inspector General content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Notification: Audit of Region 10’s Biweekly Pay Cap Waiver Process
item.description:
Project #OA-FY17-0135, Jan 24, 2017.

The EPA OIG plans to begin preliminary research on an audit of EPA Region 10’s biweekly pay cap waiver process. For more information, please click on the link above.

  • Project Notification (PDF)(2 pp, 44 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Notification: Audit of FIFRA and PRIA Funds Management
item.description:
Project #OA-FY17-0125, Jan 18, 2017.

The EPA OIG plans to begin an audit of the EPA’s funds management of the Pesticides Reregistration and Expedited Processing Fund (known as the FIFRA trust fund) and the Pesticide Registration Fund (known as the PRIA trust fund).

  • Project Notification (PDF)(3 pp, 134 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Notification: Preliminary Research on the Office of Air and Radiation’s Timekeeping Practices and Compliance With Regulations and Policies
item.description:
Project #OA-FY17-0090, December 29, 2016.

The EPA OIG plans to begin preliminary research on the Office of Air and Radiation’s timekeeping practices and compliance with federal regulations and related EPA policies and procedures.

  • Project Notification (PDF)(2 pp, 40 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Notification: FY 2017 Update of Proposed Key Management Challenges and Internal Control Weaknesses Confronting the U.S. Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board
item.description:
Jan 5, 2017.

The EPA OIG is beginning work to update for fiscal year 2017 its list of proposed key management challenges and internal control weaknesses confronting the U.S. Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board (CSB).

  • Project Notification (PDF)(2 pp, 45 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Notification: Audit of IT Security for Servers Hosting Data Pursuant to FIFRA and PRIA
item.description:
Project #OA-FY17-0091, Jan 5, 2017.

The EPA OIG plans to begin fieldwork for an audit of information technology security for servers hosting data pursuant to the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA), and the Pesticide Registration Improvement Act (PRIA).

  • Project Notification (PDF)(2 pp, 51 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Report: EPA Needs to Improve Processes for Preserving Text Messages as Federal Records
item.description:
Report #17-P-0062, December 21, 2016

What Was Found

Insufficient practices for preserving text messages could lead to noncompliance with the Federal Records Act and FOIA requirements.

Report Materials

Podcast: Report Overview with Teresa Richardson
Download audio
Download transcript (4.89 KB)
  • Report at a Glance (PDF)(1 pg, 139 K)
  • Full Report (PDF)(42 pp, 1 MB)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Notification: CIGIE Purchase Card Cross-Cutting Project
item.description:
Project #OA-FY17-0088, December 20, 2016.

The EPA OIG plans to participate in a Council of the Inspectors General on Integrity and Efficiency (CIGIE) purchase card cross-cutting project led by the U.S. Department of Agriculture OIG.

  • Project Notification (PDF)(2 pp, 43 K)
item.dc:creator: msynclar

item.title: Annual Plan - Fiscal Year 2017
item.description:
Dec 19, 2016

This plan describes how the OIG will achieve its statutory mission of promoting economy, efficiency, effectiveness and integrity relating to the programs and operations of the EPA and the U.S. Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board.

Report Materials

  • Full Document (PDF)(39 pp, 1 MB)
item.dc:creator: msynclar
